page.title: 07Ettingshall Park facilities
page.content: I live on the Ettingshall Park Farm Estate,near to the middle. There are quite a lot of activities and services. Near to where I live are two rows of shops which include a Spar grocers,Fish and chip shop, hardware, hairdressers, butchers and newsagents. Near the shops is a public house,"The Three Crowns" which is built in a large open space making for a larger custom. There is a Church of England church right at the centre of the estate and just below Beacon Hill which holds a wide range of activities:- Brownies, Guides,Cubs, Scouts, Keep-Fit and Disco's. Our main outdoor attraction is the "Beacon" covering the whole length of the area from Ettingshall Park to Sedgley. It is a wonderful walking place with grassy fields and a copse. There are many species of wild-life. The main drawback in the area is vandalism.
